title: Smokey and the Bandit 1977 SE HDrip multi-lang XviD 100% Honeyko
description:
Smokey and the Bandit, 1977: Comedy, Romance, Muscle Car, Diesel Truck
Southern Americana, Country Music, Complete lack of respect for the law

"Smokey and the Bandit"&#039;s casting of Burt Reynolds, Sally Field, Jerry
Reed and Jackie "The Great One" Gleason make it one of the ultimate
"guilty pleasure" movies; and Reed&#039;s associated score elevates it way
above the trite fluff it would have been. "Smokey" sold more tickets in
the late 70s than any other film except "Star Wars", and spawned many
sequels, imitations and TV-shows. It&#039;s just damned fun to watch.

Video Source ..........: Special Edition WS HD-DVD

DVDs and retimed from 25.000 to 23.976 so Jerry Reed doesn&#039;t sing like he
has his balls in a vice. (How do you people in PALtopia put up with this?)
